[[inst_lr_w]]
==== LR.W

*Syntax:* lr.w<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Load Reserved: load and reserve the memory location.
